amendment.description: To provide funds for the security and stabilization of Iraq by suspending a portion of the reductions in the highest income tax rate for individual taxpayers.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1796 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 373.

Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S12260-12269; text: CR S12260) To provide funds for the security and stabilization of Iraq by suspending a portion of the reductions in the highest income tax rate for individual taxpayers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1796 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 373.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator Biden.
